name: msc-ez-video
description: Modern browsers already had a vivid player for <video />. However, web developers and designers still want to custom their own style player for different situations. Sounds like web component will do a lot favor for this purpose. With <msc-ez-video /> support, customize control panel will become a piece of cake. <msc-ez-video /> adopts CSS custom properties, developers could style them as they want.
author: Paul Li
